rule-11-8-a.test_description: A one story office, single zone building has two service hot water systems serving the same building segment.

standard.ruleset_reference: Table G3.1 #11, baseline column, a & b
standard.rule_description: One system per building area type shall be modeled in the baseline.

rule-11-8-b.test_description: A one story single zone building has one service hot water systems serving its building segment with an undefined service water heating space type.

standard.ruleset_reference: Table G3.1 #11, baseline column, a & b
standard.rule_description: One system per building area type shall be modeled in the baseline.

rule-11-8-c.test_description: A one story, two zone building has two service hot water systems serving its two building segments with undefined service water heating space types.
rule-11-8-c.expected_raised_message_includes: The Service Water Heating Building Area type for this building segment is undetermined, and there are multiple building segments in the project

standard.ruleset_reference: Table G3.1 #11, baseline column, a & b
standard.rule_description: One system per building area type shall be modeled in the baseline.

rule-11-8-d.test_description: A one story, two zone building has two service hot water systems serving its two building segments with "ALL_OTHER" service water heating space types.
rule-11-8-d.expected_raised_message_includes: Confirm that Service Water Heating Building Area Type is provided with one and only one service water heating system.

standard.ruleset_reference: Table G3.1 #11, baseline column, a & b
standard.rule_description: One system per building area type shall be modeled in the baseline.

rule-11-8-e.test_description: A one story, two zone building has one service hot water systems serving its two building segments with that share the office space type.

standard.ruleset_reference: Table G3.1 #11, baseline column, a & b
standard.rule_description: One system per building area type shall be modeled in the baseline.

rule-11-8-f.test_description: A one story, two zone building has one service hot water systems serving its two building segments with different space types.

standard.ruleset_reference: Table G3.1 #11, baseline column, a & b
standard.rule_description: One system per building area type shall be modeled in the baseline.
